title: Lava Beds National Monument: Outdoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities              Outdoor Activities         A visitor hikes along the Three Sisters Trail in Lava Beds National Monument. NPS  The over 700 lava tube caves strewn about the monument are a favorite for most visitors, however hiking in Lava Beds provides stunning vistas and memorable experiences. Check out our hiking brochure for more information on trails in the monument.
